Built in support of Articles 18, 19 and 20 of the Universal Declaration of Human Rights, CENO presents a new generation of censorship circumvention possibilities.


è§£é”ç½‘ç»œ

Access web content through a network of cooperating peers - even when the internet is down or censored. Install CENO Browser today and be prepared for the next time you get ğŸ”Œ unplugged.

å£®å¤§ç½‘ç»œï¼Œæ‰“å‡»å®¡æŸ¥

Fight censorship by becoming a bridge! Install and run CENO Browser to instantly join the network and expand the availability of blocked websites to those in censored countries.

è‡ªç”±å’Œå¼€æ”¾æºç 

CENO is based on Firefox for Android (a.k.a. Mozilla Fennec), extended to make use of the innovative Ouinet library - enabling third party developers to incorporate the CENO network into their apps for peer-to-peer connectivity.


CENO Browser is a project by eQualit.ie â€“ a Canadian company developing open and reusable systems with a focus on privacy, online security and freedom of association. Technology solutions and innovations are driven by our values that guide us to protect the rights and aspirations of everyone online.
